# contentFrame

**Instance Property**

The bounds of the view, in screen coordinates, for visually rendering data values.

## Declaration

```swift
var contentFrame: CGRect { get set }
```

## Specifying the content layout

- **contentDirection**: The direction of the content in the chart.
- **AXChartDescriptor.ContentDirection**: A constant that describes the content direction of the chart.
